text: Ghosh or Ghosha is a Yadav clan from India ==Etymology== The term Ghosh/Ghosha has been derived from the Sanskrit root Ghush which means to shout, is also an indicative of the profession of a herds-man as he shouts while herding the cattle. In ancient Indian literature, the cowherds have been attributed with different appellations ike the Gopas, Ghosha, and the Abhiras. these ancient appellations have their modern counterparts viz. Guala, Ghosi and Ahir. ==References== Category:Yadav
title: Ghosh (caste)
